秪字的基本解释

秪
dī
谷物刚成熟。
再种。
植物的根。
古同“秖”。

秪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhī］
［《廣韻》丁尼切，平脂，知。］
(1)同“柢”。植物的根。引申为根本，基础。
(2)同“祗”。恭敬。
(3)同“秖”。用作助词。只；但。

秪字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　秪； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页852第02
【廣韻】丁尼切【集韻】張尼切，?音知。禾始熟曰秪。一曰再種。或作?。

秪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
秪字的起名意思

暂无。

秪
Basic explanation of words
秪
dī
The grain has just matured.
Replant.
The root of the plant.
Ancient Tong "祇".
秪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhī］
["Guangyun" Diniqie, Pingzhi, Zhi. ]
(1) Same as "柢". The root of the plant. The extension is the foundation and foundation.
(2) Same as "only". Respectfully.
(3) Same as "祇". Used as an auxiliary word. Only; but.
秪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [He Zi Department] 　秪; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 852 02
[Guang Yun] Dinniche [Ji Yun] Zhang Niche,? Yinzhi. He began to ripen and said, 秪. Plant again and again. Or for?.
秪
